name: Escape from Orbit
description:
After a failed experiment our nameless hero is sent to the space station A-37I to investigate the failure.
Dock your ship to the station, explore the wreckage and escape the horrors you find along the way!
Will you survive and make your escape or will you die alone in a an abandoned space station?

Created as part of the BGMC Game jam using Armory

https://blenderartists.org/t/bgmc-32-our-project-in-armory/1238197/2
